about_the_game:
Explore an island filled with secrets


Travel through tropical rainforests, sunny beaches, dark swamps and venture into ruins of a forgotten people. Solve puzzles and enigmas scattered around the island and uncover the fading past of the island.

The Tale of Mara & Moa is inspired by the 90's classics. A world filled with secrets to explore and dive into. Defeat hidden bosses to learn new Combat Skills, find unique Talismans that will change how you play, gather resources to upgrade your items and uncover cooking ingredients and come up with unique and crazy recipes.

Dynamic and fast paced combat


Switch between Mara and Moa to deal with various enemies. Learn varied Combat Skills and the Blessings of the Spirits to imbue your attacks with the powers of the Sun and Moon.

Inspired by legends of the native peoples


The story of The Tale of Mara & Moa shines a light on several characters from distinct mythologies of Brazil's native peoples, while bringing several references from other pre-colombian cultures.

Cooking, fishing and secrets

Gather cooking ingredientes from several regions of the island, combine them and learn of special recipes with secret bonus effects. Or combine them into weird blobs, they might not taste well, but they might still be nutritious afterall!

Minimum:
  • OS: 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8250U (4 * 1800) or equivalent; AMD Phenom II X4 965 (4 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce MX 150 ( 2048 MB); Radeon R7 260X (2048 MB)
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Mara and Moa have made a terrible mistake and now they need to find the Spirits of the Forest to save their village. Explore a world full of secrets with dynamic and fast-paced combat, alternating between the two characters and channeling the powers of the Sun and the Moon.
